java.lang.Object

              com.seaglasslookandfeel.ui.SeaGlassTabbedPaneUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyChangeListener, EventListener, SynthConstants, SwingConstants, sun.swing.plaf.synth.SynthUI
public class SeaGlassTabbedPaneUI
extends BasicTabbedPaneUI
implements sun.swing.plaf.synth.SynthUI, PropertyChangeListener

Sea Glass's TabbedPane UI delegate.

Based on SynthTabbedPaneUI.

layoutLabel

protected void layoutLabel(SeaGlassContext ss,
                           int tabPlacement,

                           int tabIndex,
                           String title,
                           Icon icon,
                           Rectangle tabRect,
                           Rectangle iconRect,
                           Rectangle textRect,
                           boolean isSelected)
Layout label text for a tab.

Parameters:
ss - the SynthContext.
tabPlacement - the side the tabs are on.
metrics - the font metrics.
tabIndex - the index of the tab to lay out.
title - the text for the label, if any.
icon - the icon for the label, if any.
tabRect - Rectangle to layout text and icon in.
iconRect - Rectangle to place icon bounds in
textRect - Rectangle to place text in
isSelected - is the tab selected?

protected boolean isOverCloseButton(int x,
                                    int y)
